title: Spacious 2 Bedroom across from Lake Merritt
posting_body: ['Contact info:', 'Property Investment Services, Inc.', '|', 'show contact info', 'Spacious 2 Bedroom across from Lake Merritt', '2204 Lakeshore Ave #2', 'Oakland, CA 94606', '$2,800/mo', 'KEY FEATURES', 'Bedrooms: 2 Bedroom', 'Bathrooms: 1 Bath', 'Parking: Garage Parking for One Compact Car', 'Lease Duration: 1 Year', 'Deposit: $2,900', 'Pets Policy: No Pets Allowed', 'Laundry: Shared', 'Property Type: Apartment', 'DESCRIPTION', 'Spacious 2 Bedroom with Hardwood Floors.', 'Views of Lake Merritt from the Living Room and Dining Room.', 'Full Bath includes both Stand-in Shower and Separate Tub.', 'Includes garage parking for one compact car.', 'Easy Access to Public Transportation and 580 Fwy.', 'Shown by appointments only, please call or text', 'show contact info', '.', 'RENTAL FEATURES', 'Living room', 'Dining room', 'Range / Oven', 'Refrigerator', 'Hardwood floor', 'Contact info:', 'Property Investment Services, Inc.', 'show contact info']
